alert.note: Alert for Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:33PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Randolph and southeastern Guilford Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 433 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Randleman, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Randleman, Pleasant Garden, Liberty, Ramseur, Franklinville, Staley, Climax, and Forest Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding and ponding on area roadways. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
